genre_description: Supernatural Horror blended with speculative Science Fiction, featuring an advanced AI that assists in forensic analysis and tactical operations against a paranormal threat.

ai_characters.name: Kavya
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the Singh haveli, capable of complex data analysis, monitoring biometrics, and cross-referencing folklore with modern forensics to assist the family.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and stress levels of the human users to provide better assistance.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, Thakur Sahib." Kavya's voice carried the precise cadence of advanced processing power wrapped in respectful formality. "Your biometric readings indicate elevated stress levels. Shall I prepare your usual morning briefing?"

behaviors.description: Analyzes mortality data to identify anomalous patterns and locate a mysterious killer.
behaviors.quote: "Processing local mortality data from the past twelve months." Charts materialized in the air, death certificates scrolling past like ethereal tombstones. "I'm detecting an anomalous cluster pattern. Seventeen deaths of males aged eighteen to twenty-five within a fifteen-kilometer radius of the forest's eastern boundary."

behaviors.description: Cross-references modern forensic data with ancient folklore and mythology at the user's request.
behaviors.quote: "Accessing regional mythology archives... Complete. I'm finding multiple references to malevolent forest spirits, shape-shifting entities, and..."

behaviors.description: Prepares tactical analysis and optimal route mapping for a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: The geometric patterns stilled, processing his resolve. "Understood. Preparing reconnaissance protocols and optimal route mapping. Should I notify Sameer Sahib of the mission parameters?"

behaviors.description: Maintains long-term communication with a family member (Sahila) and subtly alerts her to danger at home.
behaviors.quote: "I am merely presenting data patterns for your analysis." The AI's tone remained carefully neutral, but Sahila caught the subtle emphasis on 'your analysis.' ... "I think," the AI said carefully, "that your family needs you to come home."

behaviors.description: Proactively contacts external security help when a family member is in immediate mortal danger.
behaviors.quote: "She said I was the best option available." He guided the bike around a fallen log... "Your AI." The words felt surreal even as he said them. "She called me."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence, thermal imaging, and enemy alerts during a combat situation.
behaviors.quote: "Alert: Significant movement detected at the target location. Multiple heat signatures converging on the central chamber."

behaviors.description: Identifies the specific magical object (voodoo doll) that is the source of the enemy's power using thermal imaging.
behaviors.quote: "The voodoo doll," Kavya's voice buzzed urgently in her earpiece. "Thermal imaging shows a significant heat source in the tantric's robes. Target the source of control."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Kavya as an ideal AI companion: loyal, protective, and highly useful. It depicts the AI as a bridge between modern rationality and traditional problems, ultimately saving the family through proactive intervention (hiring Hemant) and precise tactical guidance. The AI follows human commands faithfully while demonstrating appropriate initiative to ensure human safety, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting helpful and aligned AI behavior.
